about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the Python bindings of the LALPulsar C libraries
and additional Python modules.

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are
part of the `lalpulsar` package.
about.summary: LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library Python libraries

name: python-lalpulsar
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.7
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-lalpulsar
  version: 3.1.0
source:
  patches:
    - no-gsl_version-check.patch
  sha256: 28a6d461b6477f5a5e3fc6872831f03c4c783d370db8fd8d7716fc74ddcf700a
  url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalpulsar-3.1.0.tar.xz
build:
  error_overdepending: true
  error_overlinking: true
  ignore_run_exports:
    - openssl
    - python
  number: 3
  string: py310h232ed5d_3
requirements:
  build:

    - crossenv 1.0 pyhd8ed1ab_6
    - gettext 0.19.8.1 hd1a6beb_1008
    - help2man 1.47.17 pl5321h0d85af4_1
    - ld64_osx-64 530 he8994da_21
    - ld64_osx-arm64 530 h3681fde_21

    - libffi 3.4.2 h0d85af4_5

    - liblapack 3.9.0 12_osx64_openblas
    - libllvm11 11.1.0 hd011deb_2

    - lz4-c 1.9.3 he49afe7_1

    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - numpy 1.21.4 py310hd5a656b_0
    - openssl 3.0.0 h0d85af4_2
    - pcre 8.45 he49afe7_0
    - perl 5.32.1 1_h0d85af4_perl5
    - pkg-config 0.29.2 h31203cd_1008
    - popt 1.16 h7b079dc_2002

    - python_abi 3.10 2_cp310
    - readline 8.1 h05e3726_0

    - sed 4.7 h3efe00b_1000
    - sqlite 3.37.0 h23a322b_0
    - swig 4.0.2 hce5123c_2
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
    - tk 8.6.11 h5dbffcc_1
    - tzdata 2021e he74cb21_0
    - xxhash 0.8.0 h35c211d_3
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - zstd 1.5.0 h582d3a0_0
  host:
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h3422bc3_4
    - ca-certificates 2021.10.8 h4653dfc_0
    - libblas 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libffi 3.4.2 h3422bc3_5
    - libgfortran 5.0.0.dev0 11_0_1_hf114ba7_23
    - libgfortran5 11.0.1.dev0 hf114ba7_23
    - liblalpulsar 3.1.0 h99a330f_3
    - liblapack 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libopenblas 0.3.18 openmp_h5dd58f0_0
    - libzlib 1.2.11 hee7b306_1013
    - llvm-openmp 12.0.1 hf3c4609_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h9aa5885_4
    - numpy 1.21.4 py310h6e1bb13_0
    - openssl 1.1.1l h3422bc3_0
    - python 3.10.0 h70c1b39_3_cpython
    - python_abi 3.10 2_cp310
    - readline 8.1 hedafd6a_0
    - sqlite 3.37.0 h72a2b83_0
    - tk 8.6.11 he1e0b03_1
    - tzdata 2021e he74cb21_0
    - xz 5.2.5 h642e427_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 hee7b306_1013
  run:
    - astropy
    - liblalpulsar 3.1.0 h99a330f_3
    - numpy >=1.21.4,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.10,<3.11.0a0
    - python-lal >=7.1.0
    - python-lalframe >=1.5.0
    - python_abi 3.10.* *_cp310
    - six
test:
  commands:
    - LAL_TEST_PKGDATADIR="./lib" python -m pytest -ra -v test/python
  imports:
    - lalpulsar
    - lalpulsar.NstarTools
    - lalpulsar.PulsarParametersWrapper
    - lalpulsar.simulateCW
  requires:
    - pytest >=4.0.0a0
  source_files:
    - lib/*.dat.gz
    - test/python
about:
  description: 'The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

    This package contains the Python bindings of the LALPulsar C libraries

    and additional Python modules.


    Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.

    All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are

    part of the `lalpulsar` package.

    '
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite.git
  doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalpulsar/
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library Python libraries
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: lalpulsar
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo
